code: import{BLEND_MODES}from'@pixi/constants';export class SpriteUtilities{static hex2int(hex){return parseInt(hex,16);}static inkToBlendMode(ink){if(ink=='ADD'||ink==33)return BLEND_MODES.ADD;if(ink=='SUBTRACT')return BLEND_MODES.SUBTRACT;if(ink=='DARKEN')return BLEND_MODES.DARKEN;return BLEND_MODES.NORMAL;}}
